name: bark chips, wet, measured as dry mass to generic market for residual hardwood, wet | residual softwood, wet | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22923/documentation

This activity is linking the more specific market for bark chips, to the more generic market for residual hardwood, wet; and residual softwood, wet.It makes accesible the specific product bark chips through the more generic products of wet residual wood.;[This dataset is meant to replace the following datasets:]

Entry of the specific product "bark chips, wet, measured as dry mass"

Delivery of the generic products "residual hardwood, wet" and "residual softwood, wet"
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/161:Sawmilling and planing of wood/1610:Sawmilling and planing of wood

flow.name: residual softwood, wet
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/161:Sawmilling and planing of wood/1610:Sawmilling and planing of wood

exchanges.description: Calculated using the Dry Mass of the reference product and the by-product. It has been considered that this product feeds the generic markets for "residual hardwood, wet" and "residual softwood, wet" in a 50%:50% share.

flow.name: bark chips, wet, measured as dry mass
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/17:Manufacture of paper and paper products/170:Manufacture of paper and paper products/1701:Manufacture of pulp, paper and paperboard
